definition: winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)

sentences.english: Winter bamboo shoots can be found in four major Chinese cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 在中國的四大菜系裏，都能見到冬筍。

sentences.english: The winter bamboo shoot hides in the earth, and is hard to find on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 冬筍藏在土層的下面，從竹林的表面上看什麼也沒有。

sentences.english: The winter bamboo shoot is seasonal and hard to preserve.
sentences.chinese: 冬筍時令性極強又難以保存。

definition: fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
long thread moss (Nostoc flagelliforme), an edible algae/also called faat choy or hair moss
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
day lily (Hemerocallis), used in Chinese medicine and cuisine
vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
